tutorial/Lesson3/real_value.h

00001 #include <vector>
00002 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00008 // INIT
00009 double real_value(const std::vector<double>& _ind)
00010 {
00011   double sum = 0;
00012   for (unsigned i = 0; i < _ind.size(); i++)
00013       {
00014           sum += _ind[i] * _ind[i];
00015       }
00016   return sum;
00017 }
